StoreInformation.details: You probably already think your cat is quite the unicorn, but you can easily make it official with this accessory that definitely won't get you clawed to oblivion.
Dogs deserve to feel every bit as stylish as their human counterparts. And fortunately, this wig can help them achieve that goal.
Finally, you can indulge in everyone's life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, thoughâ€”some might mistake it for dandruff.
While it's all well and good to have a variety of puppets at your disposal, few things rival this strangely-realistic hand squirrel.

StoreInformation.productName: A tennis ball with a head strap
StoreInformation.details: While billed as a way to improve your reflexes as a boxer, it seems like an equally good way to get hit in the face with a tennis ball over and over.
